    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether to enable Elastic Load Balancing connection draining.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}`ebs_volume` blocks, as described below, will each create an EBS volume and connect it to the layer's instances.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

## Look up an Existing JavaAppLayer Resource {#look-up}

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_arn~csharp">

    </dt>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_autoassignelasticips~csharp">
<span class="nx">

<a class="anchorjs-link " href="#state_autoassignelasticips~csharp" aria-label="Anchor" data-anchorjs-icon="" style="font: 1em / 1 anchorjs-icons;padding-left: 0.375em;"></a>
